name: Mario Goes to the Fridge to get a Glass of Milk 2
name_original: Mario Goes to the Fridge to get a Glass of Milk 2
description:
Mario Goes to the Fridge to get a Glass of Milk is a classic platform game heavily focused on exploration.  This game is currently an amazing demo and if there is enough support for it I will make this small demo into a full game, with multiple levels and collectibles. There is a Mac downloadable version, and PC version. However there are some glitches occurring in the PC current build of the game. Enjoy!

This game is a joke please do not take it to seriously.
